skill.name: behaviors.skills.primitives.Create
skill.description:
For an gent to know how to create and build a set of given 'Works'.
When several works should be created, the agent acts on each work by following the order of the elements into the 'works' list.
A visited work won't be created and build if agent doesn't have the physical capability or if it hasn't enough resources. In that specific case, agent will decide to visit the next one.

parameter.name: works
parameter.description: The set of construction to build.

parameter.name: waitForReinforcement
parameter.description: Define if agent needs to wait for reinforcement when it is not able to create and build a work.

link.name: reach
link.description: To go to the location where to build the construction.

link.name: create
link.description: To create and build the given works.

feedback.name: creating
feedback.description: Sent while a work is being built.

argument.name: work
argument.description: The work that is beeing built.

feedback.name: created
feedback.description: Sent upon completion of the simulation action, once the work is done.

argument.name: work
argument.description: Work that has been created or built.

feedback.name: notCreated
feedback.description: Sent each time a 'Work' cannot be create and build (no pysical capability for instance).

feedback.name: done
feedback.description: Sent when all "Work" have been visited (even if one or few of them haven't been created).

feedback.name: failed
feedback.description: Sent if the set of "works" is empty (no element to act on).
